# datapower_usergroup (Resource)

User group
  - CLI Alias: `usergroup`

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "datapower_usergroup" "test" {
  id              = "UserGroup_name"
  access_policies = ["*/*/*?Access=r"]
}
```
